div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
Profiles to be supported by EMRs and payor systems conforming to this implementation guide

tr.td: CRD constraints on STU3 Appointment resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 CommunicationRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to inclusion in coverage requirements discovery proposed actions
CRD constraints on STU3 Coverage resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification of a patient's coverage in coverage requirements queries
CRD constraints on STU3 Coverage resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification of a coverage plan type without exposing patient identity
CRD constraints on STU3 Device resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of a device referenced by a DeviceRequest or other CRD-relevant resource
CRD constraints on STU3 DeviceRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 Encounter resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of an encounter
CRD constraints on STU3 Location resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the location of an event or ordered event
CRD constraints on STU3 MedicationRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 NutritionOrder resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 Organization resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the organization responsible for ordering or performing an activity
CRD constraints on STU3 Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to identification and description of the patient for whom coverage requirements are being discovered
CRD constraints on STU3 Patient resource mandating support for elements relevant to sharing demographics relevant to coverage evaluation without revealing patient identity

CRD constraints on STU3 Practitioner resource mandating support for elements relevant to identifying and describing a healthcare provider or administrative staff involved in performing a coverage requirement discovery-related action
CRD constraints on STU3 ProcedureRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 ReferralRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery
CRD constraints on STU3 Task resource describing how to request that a Questionnaire be completed
CRD constraints on STU3 VisionPrescription resource mandating support for elements relevant to coverage requirements discovery

div.p: Extensions defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 extension that allows conveying insurance information associated with a request when the request resouce doesn't have a core element that supports capturing such information.

div.p: Search Parameters defined as part of this implementation guide

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for appointments based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying an appointment
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for encounters based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying an encounter
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for device requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a device request

td.a: • CRD Device Request On Behalf Of - STU3

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for device requests based on the organization on whose behalf the order was placed - allows use of _include to retrieve the organization when querying a device request

td.a: • CRD Medication Request On Behalf Of - STU3

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for medication requests based on the organization on whose behalf the order was placed - allows use of _include to retrieve the organization when querying a medication request
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for medication requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a medication request
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for nutrition orders based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a nutrition order
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for procedure requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a procedure request

td.a: • CRD Procedure Request On Behalf Of - STU3

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for procedure requests based on the organization on whose behalf the order was placed - allows use of _include to retrieve the organization when querying a procedure request
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for referral requests based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a referral request

td.a: • CRD Referral Request On Behalf Of - STU3

tr.td: Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for referral requests based on the organization on whose behalf the order was placed - allows use of _include to retrieve the organization when querying a referral request
Custom CRD STU3 search parameter allowing search for vision prescriptions based on the associated insurance - allows use of _include to retrieve insurance when querying a vision prescription

div.p: Value Sets and/or code systems defined as part of this implementation guide

td.a: • CRD STU3 Task Types Code System

tr.td: Codes for use with FHIR STU3 to identify types of tasks relevant to coverage requirement discovery

td.a: • CRD STU3 Task Reasons Code System

tr.td: Codes for use with FHIR STU3 to identify reasons for task performance relevant to coverage requirement discovery
The subset of FHIR STU3 location address types relevant for coverage requirement discovery
All FHIR STU3 task codes relevant to coverage requirements discovery
All FHIR STU3 task reasons relevant to coverage requirements discovery
